utils
Class SimpleDate

java.lang.Object
  utils.SimpleDate

public class SimpleDate
extends java.lang.Object

A class to represent simple date format. It does create the instances through Java's Calendar so that at least you won't get an illegal date.

Constant Field Values

year

public int year
The year of this date.

month

public int month
The month of this date. January is encoded as 1, feb as 2, and so on.

day

public int day
The number of this date in its month (e.g. it for 1st january it will be 1, for 2nd it will be 2 etc).

SimpleDate

public SimpleDate(int d,
                  int m,
                  int y)
Creating a date.

Parameters:
d - The day of the month, e.g. 31
m - Month number; 1 for January, 2 for February, etc.
y - The year
